attributes.action: work towards the removal of turkish troops from cyprus and the return of all properties to the original owners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make sure that Turkey withdraws all troops from Cyprus and return all aspects of life  to the way they were before the invasion.  This should occur before any consideration is given to Turkey becoming a full member of Europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
